rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I have a question for you, Driver-san
and Blade-san...

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0002
rows.name: You fight monsters a lot, right?

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Are there any monsters that get angry
when their health starts to get low?

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0005
rows.name: Yes, there are monsters like that

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0006
rows.name: No, there aren't any monsters like that

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0008
rows.name:
Monsters are alive too, so of course
they get angry sometimes.

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0010
rows.name:
Are there really monsters that can
block our attacks?

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0012
rows.name:
It must be really hard to beat them
if you can't stop them from guarding.

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0013
rows.name:
Thanks for answering my questions!
I'm gonna go brag to my dad now.

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0015
rows.name:
But maybe it's just that you haven't
met one yet.
